arg.name: scanner_list
arg.tp:docstring: The list of connected scanners. Returns a protobuf representing a list of SaneDevice structs as provided by SANE.

method.name: GetScannerCapabilities
method.tp:docstring: Returns the supported capabilities for scanner |device_name|.

method.name: StartScan
method.tp:docstring: Sets up a multi-page scan job. Initiates a connection to the scanner and prepares for scanning. Once called, the client can call GetNextImage to fetch image data.

arg.name: start_scan_request
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized StartScanRequest proto specifying the scanner to use and the settings for the scan.

method.name: GetNextImage
method.tp:docstring:
Reads the next image for the given scan job and outputs image data to out_fd.
A response will be sent once image acquisition has started successfully or if acquiring the image failed.

arg.name: get_next_image_request
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized GetNextImageRequest proto specifying the scan job uuid.

arg.name: out_fd
arg.tp:docstring: Output file descriptor. PNG image data will be written to this fd.

method.name: CancelScan
method.tp:docstring: Attempts to cancel the scan job specified by the given UUID.

arg.name: cancel_scan_request
arg.tp:docstring: Serialized CancelScanRequest proto specifying the scan job to cancel.

method.name: SetDebugConfig
method.tp:docstring: Configure lorgnette debugging. Lorgnette will exit automatically after returning from this call if the requested config can't be implemented without restarting the process.

method.name: StartScannerDiscovery
method.tp:docstring: Start monitoring for scanners and send ScannerListChanged signals when devices that match the request are found.

method.name: StopScannerDiscovery
method.tp:docstring: Stop a previously started discovery session. Note that ScannerListChanged signals may continue to be sent if other discovery sessions are still active.

arg.name: signal
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized ScannerListChangedSignal proto, containing an event type and information about the affected scanner. Listeners should check for a matching `session_id` to avoid responding to events requested by other sessions.

arg.name: scan_status_changed_signal
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized ScanStatusChangedSignal proto, containing a scan id, scan state, and potentially a failure reason or progress percentage.
